mapper.select: SELECT s.score_no AS scoreNo, s.student_no AS studentNo, s.emp_no AS empNo, s.course_no AS courseNo, c.course_name AS courseName, s.score_att AS scoreAtt, s.score_project AS scoreProject, s.score_mid AS scoreMid, s.score_fin AS scoreFin, s.score_total AS scoreTotal, s.score_grade AS scoreGrade, s.score_status AS scoreStatus FROM score s INNER JOIN course c ON s.course_no = c.course_no WHERE s.student_no = #{studentNo} ORDER BY s.score_no DESC
